Windup 6.3.5.Final Javadoc
  • All Classes
 

Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.scan.provider

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheFileModelPrettyPathRuleProvider
    Caches the relative paths of FileModels in the graph.
    ClearProjectTraversalCacheRuleProvider
    Clear the caches used in the ProjectTraversalCache
    DeleteWorkDirsAtTheEndRuleProvider
    Deletes the directories with the content unzipped from the archives.
    DiscoverAdditionalProjectDetails  
    DiscoverArchiveLicenseFilesRuleProvider
    Discovers Licenses files within archives and adds the LicenseModel type to the FileModel.
    DiscoverArchiveManifestFilesRuleProvider
    Discovers MANIFEST.MF files within archives.
    DiscoverArchiveTypesRuleProvider
    Iterates over discovered archives and sets their vertices' types.
    DiscoverDuplicateArchiveProjectsRuleProvider
    This creates DuplicateProjectModels, associates them with the DuplicateArchiveModels and attaches them to the canonical ProjectModels.
    DiscoverFilesAndTypesRuleProvider
    Recurses into directories under Windup input(s) and creates FileModel vertices for them in the graph.
    DiscoverMavenHierarchyRuleProvider
    Links the Maven artifact archives according to their hierarchy.
    DiscoverMavenProjectsRuleProvider
    Discover Maven pom files and build a MavenProjectModel containing this metadata.
    DiscoverNonMavenArchiveProjectsRuleProvider
    Finds Archives that were not classified as Maven archives/projects, and adds some generic project information for them.
    DiscoverNonMavenSourceProjectsRuleProvider
    Finds files that were not classified as Maven archives/projects, and adds some generic project information for them.
    DiscoverOrganizationByPackageStructureProvider
    Look at the package structure of the archive.
    DiscoverPropertiesFilesRuleProvider
    Discovers Java-style .properties files and places them into the graph.
    FindUnboundJavaReferencesRuleProvider
    Finds references to Java classes that were not found in the application and also not in the target environment.
    IndexJavaSourceFilesRuleProvider
    Discovers .java files from the applications being analyzed.
    JavaFileMappingRuleProvider
    Discovers .class files from the applications being analyzed.
    MavenProjectDependencyLocationExtractor
    Given a Node in a Maven POM file which contains a dependency, extracts its location.
    UnzipArchivesToOutputRuleProvider
    Unzip archives from the input application.
